history.content:
<md>Hi,

Will a < 2.0 GPA in my last semester prevent me from graduating if both my cumulative and technical upper div GPA are > 2.0? For context, I was busy recruiting last semester, which was the final one, so my semester GPA fell below 2.0 but I still passed all my classes and I believe that I've met all graduation requirements. If the college graduates me, will my transcript show that I was on Academic Probation in my final semester, and can I contest it?

Thanks!
</md>
history.subject: < 2.0 GPA in Final Semester
